title: Spacious 1Bed/1Bath with Heat and cooking gas included in rent !!!!
posting_body: HEAT, COOKING GAS, AND WATER INCLUDED.
Well maintained and extremely spacious 1-bedroom apartment located in Chicago's beautiful Jefferson Park Area is available now.
Kitchen is with updated cabinets, new flooring throughout, a dining room with built-in cabinet, a bright living room, an updated bathroom, and many closets!!
Close to everything... shopping, restaurants, post office, library and schools.
Short walk to Jefferson Park blue line, CTA Metra station and expressway I-90.
Heat, cooking gas, and water included in rent.
Parking space available for $75 per month.
- Must have credit score of 600 or higher (or co-signer)
- No evictions or collections with Peoples Gas/ComEd
- First month rent + a $325 non-refundable move in fee is required at lease signing.
- No Large or aggressive dog breeds Please (pets under 35 lbs are welcome).
Contact our leasing agent Sandy to schedule a viewing  TEXT 8479702541
